entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
